Articles.Content:
Hi all!

I've built a pretty basic science station to orbit Kerbin*, but I find its starting to feel a little cramped up there. I've been browsing a lot, but frankly there's a lot to take in - so I was wondering if anyone had recommendations for habitats or general science-y things I could send up there to extend it?

The two I have seen that intrigue me most, are Nertea's stock-a-like habitats, and Porkjet's inflateables.

Here is the station for reference (sorry, I don't know how to link imgur albums properly) - there are three clamp-o-trons, so there should be plenty of space to expand

http://imgur.com/a/DnhCC#2

Thank you in advance!

*There's also a slightly modified version that's currently set for an interplanetary science station, for each planet - they kind of remind me of sonic screwdrivers when the panels are in
With Station Science you can make your stations actually useful.

With Station Science you can make your stations actually useful.

And:

Fuel Science (add-on for Station Science)

Orbital Material Science

DMagic Orbital Science

Ooooh, awesome, thanks guys! Not to sure about the orbital materials one, but the rest look pretty ace

*adds to list*

Right, those three mods have been loaded, and are currently on their way to the station - it's gonna be ace

Any more recommendations whilst they're on the way up?

Right, those three mods have been loaded, and are currently on their way to the station - it's gonna be ace

Any more recommendations whilst they're on the way up?

You might check out Bobcat's ISS Community and Mir packs
